meanings.definition: The activity of hiking and camping while carrying one's belongings in a backpack.
meanings.sent1: During our backpacking trip, we hiked through the mountains and slept in tents.
meanings.sent2: Backpacking is a fun way to explore nature while carrying everything you need on your back.
meanings.sent3: I tried backpacking once, but my backpack was so heavy I felt like a turtle!
meanings.sent4: Her backpacking journey was a test of endurance and self-reliance.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of backpacking lies in the simplicity of carrying your world on your shoulders.
